attributes.additional_details:
Simple - Get our Troops back to the UK From Afghanistan and all other serving countries.

Since October 2001, 404 British Troops have died in Afghanistan alone (not county other service countries). Most recent, 6 lads from Lanc & Yorkshire Regiments.

NOW is the time to bring home our Troops wherever they may be serving.

We need to take action NOW - All we ask for this to reach parliment is 100,000 names and we only have 6 months to reach the deadline.

Support Our Soldiers - BRING HOME OUR TROOPS
